name: spark-js-sdk-example
description: An example app for Cisco Spark's JavaScript SDK.
author: Asynchrony

scripts.start-dev: watchify src/js/index.js -o src/js/bundle.js & watchify src/js/loginController -o src/js/loginBundle.js & node server.js
scripts.build: browserify src/js/index.js -o src/js/bundle.js & browserify src/js/loginController -o src/js/loginBundle.js
